code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     if ("password".equals(request.header("Secret"))) {         RestResponse response = new BytesRestResponse(RestStatus.OK, "Access granted").         response.addHeader("Secret", "granted").         return channel -> channel.sendResponse(response).     } else {         RestResponse response = new BytesRestResponse(RestStatus.UNAUTHORIZED, "Access denied").         response.addHeader("Secret", "required").         return channel -> channel.sendResponse(response).     } }
